docs.title: Notebook
docs.text:
This is Knockning's personal notebook.

这里是Knocking的个人笔记本.

docs.title: About this notebook
docs.text:
Everytime when you write a new note... 

mkdocs build
mkdocs gh-deploy
git add --all
git commit -m "blablabla"
git push   # add "-u origin main" for the first push

To preview the notebook locally... 

mkdocs serve

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Create a new github repository
docs.text:
Create a new repository

echo "# notes" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin git@github.com:{MyName}/{RepoName}.git
git push -u origin main

Push an existing repo with command lines

git remote add origin git@github.com:{MyName}/{RepoName}.git
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main
